item.title: Literally Keeping It Simple!
item.description: This is the last time I am creating a new Hugo block. This is the last time I try to change themes. Let’s keep it simple from now on. This is the last time I am updating Hugo. You can say I am hard stuck on 0.79 from now on. I am angry cause I am wasting time and I know it :P See you.
